Module com.example.c195project
Package helper

Class TimeHelper

java.lang.Object
helper.TimeHelper
public abstract class TimeHelper extends Object
class used to help with logic and conversions dealing with time zones and appointment times, and time formatting
Author:
Anthony Collins

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Function<LocalDateTime,String>
    formatLocalDateTime
    A lambda expression that formats a given LocalDateTime object as a string using a specified format.
    static DateTimeFormatter
    formatter
    date time formatter for formatting time throughout the application
    static Predicate<LocalDateTime>
    withinBusinessHoursCheck
    this lambda expression uses A Predicate functional interface that checks if a given LocalDateTime falls within business hours in Eastern Standard Time (EST) time zone.The predicate converts the input LocalDateTime to EST time zone using the system default time zone and checks if it falls within the range of 8 AM to 10 PM EST.

  • Field Details

    • formatter

      public static DateTimeFormatter formatter
      date time formatter for formatting time throughout the application

    • withinBusinessHoursCheck

      public static Predicate<LocalDateTime> withinBusinessHoursCheck
      this lambda expression uses A Predicate functional interface that checks if a given LocalDateTime falls within business hours in Eastern Standard Time (EST) time zone.The predicate converts the input LocalDateTime to EST time zone using the system default time zone and checks if it falls within the range of 8 AM to 10 PM EST.

    • formatLocalDateTime

      public static Function<LocalDateTime,String> formatLocalDateTime
      A lambda expression that formats a given LocalDateTime object as a string using a specified format. The function takes a LocalDateTime input and formats it as a string using a DateTimeFormatter object specified by the "formatter" variable. The formatted string is returned as the output.

  • Constructor Details

    • TimeHelper

      public TimeHelper()

  • Method Details

    • appointmentWithin15Min

      public static String appointmentWithin15Min() throws SQLException
      method checking if an appointment is within fifteen minutes if when it is called on,
      Returns:
      returns a list of appointments within fifteen minutes including the customer name, appointment ID start time of the appointment and how many minutes that is in which is passed into an alert. or returns an alert informing the user there are no appointments within the next fifteen minutes.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • convertFromUTCToSystemDefault

      public static LocalDateTime convertFromUTCToSystemDefault(LocalDateTime input)
      method to convert from UTC to the systemDefault timeZone.
      Parameters:
      input - a LocalDateTime that is EST.
      Returns:
      a LocaleDateTime that is in system default time.

    • convertFromESTToSystemDefault

      public static String convertFromESTToSystemDefault()
      method to convert from EST to system default time specifically used to check if an appointment is between 8AM - 10PM in EST and if it is not convert 8AM - 10PM EST to the system default time zone.
      Returns:
      a String of the system default timezone equivalent of 8AM-10PM EST.

    • convertFromSystemDefaultToUTC

      public static LocalDateTime convertFromSystemDefaultToUTC(LocalDateTime input)
      method converts from system default time to UTC.
      Parameters:
      input - LocalDate time in the system default time zone.
      Returns:
      a LocaleDateTime in UTC.
